content:
Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 11}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 31}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a torch, I need to smelt the coal_ore at slot 21 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
act: smelt from slot 21 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 11}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 31}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the coal, I can move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 11}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 31}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have the coal, I need to move the stick to the right of the coal in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move it to slot 4.
act: move from slot 10 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 11}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 31}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the torches, I can move them to a free slot in my inventory (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
